snippet: Opening statements are to begin on Wednesday in a trial that is expected to last through June. The jurors will not know until the end of the trial which 12 members will take part in deliberations.
abstract: Jury of eight men and 10 women, most of them middle-class and white, are selected for trial of Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev; all jurors have said they are willing to condemn Tsarnaev to death, requirement of death penalty case.
lead_paragraph: Opening statements are to begin on Wednesday in a trial that is expected to last through June. The jurors will not know until the end of the trial which 12 members will take part in deliberations.

headline.main: Jurors Chosen for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev’s Trial in Boston Marathon Bombings
headline.print_headline: Eight Men and 10 Women Are Selected as Jurors in Boston Marathon Trial
